content:
At first, I wanted to improve my acting skills,
so I recorded everyone's instant "reactions"
to use as reference for my performances.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Later I discovered,
The most practical application I found for this course
was taking "reaction meme" photos of everyone.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I guess this is one way to gather material,
especially when I see visitors from other worlds
doing all sorts of bizarre things...
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I just took a night school class,
learning about photography.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I gave it a try too,
But in the end,
I found sleeping was way more interesting.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Please don't be startled,
I just thought of something funny! You see,
I figure if I laugh it all out now, I won't break character during the performance.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Good evening! I'm taking inventory of my PuffPost orders.
Since I have lots of performance props,
I need to count everything carefully at the end of each day.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
In a World Bubble called Franly,
people wipe themselves with cold water,
and hold nighttime running races.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Good evening, Traveler!
Every night, I tune in to the Parade Station broadcasts
to catch up on all the exciting things happening in the world today.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
The night is playing its wonderful overture,
Granting me time for my thoughts to soar free and create,
Kehehehe~ke! If you hear strange laughter,
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊
